description: Try our easy to follow Potato & Rosemary Pizza recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Vegetable pizza,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Potato,Halal,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Potato & Rosemary Pizza Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large red washed potato, thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 230Â°C. Line a baking tray with baking paper or heat a pizza stone.

Spread base with cheese. Toss potato with a little oil, garlic and rosemary, then season. Arrange potato over base, overlapping the slices. Bake for 15 minutes or until potato is tender and golden. Drizzle with any remaining oil and serve immediately.
